List<JBCXM__C360Sections__c> c360SecList = [SELECT Id, Name FROM JBCXM__C360Sections__c WHERE Name = 'AccountAttributes'];
JBCXM__C360Sections__c c360Sec = c360SecList.get(0);
c360Sec.JBCXM__IsActive__c = true;
update c360Sec;
DELETE [SELECT Id FROM JBCXM__UIViews__c WHERE JBCXM__UITabName__c = 'Customer360'];
JBCXM__UIViews__c UIView  = new JBCXM__UIViews__c(Name = 'Customer 360',
                                                   JBCXM__UITabName__c = 'Customer360',
                                                    JBCXM__Visibility__c = 'Public',
                                                    JBCXM__ShowDefault__c = true,
